Container.Name: Tailscale DNS Manager
Container.Overview:
Tailscale Internal DNS Manager - Automatically manages DNS records for Tailscale devices with dynamic CoreDNS configuration and Let's Encrypt certificates.
This container runs both the API service and CoreDNS in a single container for simplified Unraid deployment.
Features: • Dynamic Tailscale device discovery and DNS record creation • Let's Encrypt certificate automation with DNS-01 challenges • RESTful API for DNS record management • Automatic firewall protection for Tailscale networks • Health monitoring and device persistence
Container.Description:
Manages internal DNS for Tailscale networks with automatic device discovery, dynamic DNS record creation, and Let's Encrypt certificate integration.
IMPORTANT: This container requires privileged mode for firewall management (iptables/ipset).
After installation: 1. Configure your Tailscale API key and tailnet 2. Set your internal domain (must be a domain you control) 3. Provide email for Let's Encrypt certificates 4. Container will automatically discover Tailscale devices and create DNS records
Web interface available at: http://[IP]:8080/health DNS queries: point devices to [IP]:53

Config.Description: Directory to store application configuration files

Config.Name: SSL Certificates
Config.Description: Directory for Let's Encrypt SSL certificates

Config.Name: Tailscale API Key

Config.Name: Tailnet Name
Config.Description: Your Tailnet name (e.g., example.com or your-org-name)

Config.Name: Internal Domain
Config.Description: Domain for internal DNS (e.g., internal.yourdomain.com) - Must be a domain you control!

Config.Description: Use Let's Encrypt production (true) or staging (false) certificates. Use staging for testing!

Config.Name: Cloudflare API Token
Config.Description: Cloudflare API token for DNS-01 challenges (leave empty if not using Cloudflare)

Config.Description: Tailscale device name for this DNS server (defaults to container hostname, or leave empty for auto-detection)

Config.Name: Sync Interval
Config.Description: How often to sync Tailscale devices (e.g., 30m, 1h, 2h)

Config.Name: Enable TLS
Config.Description: Enable HTTPS/TLS when certificates are ready

Config.Name: DNS Resolvers
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of DNS resolvers for ACME challenge verification

Config.Name: Certificate Renewal Check Interval
Config.Description: How often to check for certificate renewal (e.g., 1h, 24h)
